saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service

Class RangeNotifierImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.RangeNotifierImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.altbeacon.beacon.RangeNotifier

    public class RangeNotifierImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.altbeacon.beacon.RangeNotifier
    This class receives and parses the beacon information and fires the BeaconNotifier#onUpdate(ArrayList) callback with the parsed beacons. Furthermore it starts sending all beacons to all registered endpoints.
